title: The Emperor of the Immortal Realm - Novel Updates
tags: Army Building   Arrogant Characters   Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Calm Protagonist   Cultivation   Death of Loved Ones   Dragons   Eidetic Memory   Fated Lovers   Feng Shui   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Phoenixes   Politics   Polygamy   Protagonist with Multiple Bodies   Reincarnation   Revenge   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Saints   Strong to Stronger   Wars
author: Guan Qi   Watching Chess   观棋
description:
All over the realm, no orthodoxies but me.

To sweep all the immortal sects with the power of Celestial Empire.

A powerhouse man who cultivated “Dao of an Emperor” Flew down to the world of immortal sects. A secular dynasty, despised by the cultivators, stepped up to be on a par with supreme immortal sects.

The rules of the dynasty wrote, all under the heaven was king’s lands, all the creatures served the king. There was only one orthodoxy on the realm, and all the immortal sects were illegal!>
